Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI gives real time feedback that I can incorporate into my work, I have learnt more about grammar, writing academically and referencing than just reading a guide or textbook about it.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from GenAI is suggestive with positive reinforcement, whereas teacher feedback can often be negative and pick out all of the bad things.
